## üèóÔ∏è TECH STACK & ARCHITECTURE

**Frontend:**
- React 18 + TypeScript + Vite
- Tailwind CSS (Glassmorphism UI)
- Deployed: Cloudflare Pages
- Domain: aidoesitall.website

**Backend:**
- Node.js + Express API
- PostgreSQL 16 (Docker)
- Prisma ORM
- Port: 3000 / 8080
- Domain: api.aidoesitall.website

**Payment System (FIAT FIRST):**
- Square API (Production mode) - PRIMARY
- Stripe (Secondary)
- Webhook processing for payment events
- Automatic 60/30/10 split calculation
